messages.message: @anik.b <!subteam^S07855GV3GV> `create-deployment.spec.ts` test failed because the `Deploy` tab isn't showing in the "all workspaces" view. Introduced by this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71003). Sample run: https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/19913/overview/c901a8a7-1b27-449c-81ae-[â€¦]rHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&ts=1749490316858.0999&att=1 (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/19913/overview/c901a8a7-1b27-449c-81ae-2a8331ee28e8/replay?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&ts=1749490316858.0999&att=1)
@Weiming Wu can you help Anik fix this?
We need to add `isActionAllowedAcrossSharedRepos` to gate the all workspaces case

why did this test not fail on Anik's PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71003)?
-> it seems the test wasn't even included in the CI run (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/19786/test-results?actions=%5B%5D&browsers=%5B%5D&groups=%5B%5D&isFlaky=%5B%5D&modificationDateRange=%7B%22startDate%22:%221970-01-01%22,%22endDate%22:%222038-01-19%22%7D&orderBy=EXECUTION_ORDER&oses=%5B%5D&specs=%5B%5D&statuses=%5B%5D&testingTypesEnum=%5B%5D)
-> it seems we need to add `pages/Workspaces` to `apps/src/aihub/__e2e__/Deployments/dependencies.test.ts`
-> i created a PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71251) to update `dependencies.test.ts`
